---
title: "Report"
format: html

---

```{r}
#|echo: false
#|include: false


source("libraries.R")
df <- read_delim("data/240508_results.csv", delim = ";",show_col_types = F)

df1 <- df %>% 
  slice(1:10)

```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

df2 <- df1[1,]

cat(paste0("## ",df2$reference,"\n"))

cat("\n ")

cat(paste0("Reference: ",df2$reference,
           "\nTopic: ",df2$type,
           "\nDate:",df2$date,
           "\nSummary: ",df2$summary,
           "\n"))


```
